    • Constructor Detail

      • DoerDatabase

        public DoerDatabase(java.lang.String hostURL,
                    int hostPort,
                    java.lang.String dbName,
                    java.lang.String hostUsername,
                    java.lang.String hostPassword,
                    DatabaseType dbType)
             throws java.sql.SQLException,
                    InitializationFailureException,
                    NotFoundException
        Constructs DoerDatabase instance with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        hostURL - The Host(IP) address to the databases.
        hostPort - The port used by mysql servers.
        dbName - The name of the database to connect.
        hostUsername - Username which is used to establish the connection.
        hostPassword - Password associated with the given username.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If JDBC Driver cannot establish a connection to the server.
        InitializationFailureException - If DoerDatabase fails to be initialized.
        NotFoundException - If Meta Table / Sync Table / Any trigger(s) are not found in the given database.

    • Method Detail

      • executeQuery

        public java.sql.ResultSet executeQuery(java.lang.String sqlQuery)
                                throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                       InitializationFailureException
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        InitializationFailureException

      • executeUpdate

        public int executeUpdate(java.lang.String sqlQuery)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException,
                         InitializationFailureException
        Executes a raw SQL ADD/UPDATE/DELETE query on the databases. No addition of the Query to Meta Table.
        Parameters:
        sqlQuery - The ADD/UPDATE/DELETE query to be executed on the databases.
        Returns:
        int The number of columns affected.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If any exception occurs during the ADD/UPDATE/DELETE query execution.
        InitializationFailureException - If DoerDatabase Implementation failed to initialize.

      • getDatabaseName

        public java.lang.String getDatabaseName()
        Used to obtain the name of the database.
        Returns:
        String The Name of the Database.

      • getMetaTable

        public DoerDBMetaTable getMetaTable()
        Used to obtain the Meta Table associated with the database.
        Returns:
        DoerDBMetaTable for the container database.

      • getSyncDataTable

        public DoerDBSyncDataTable getSyncDataTable()
        Used to obtain Sync Data Table associated with the database. This would return null if the instance of DoerDatabase is a type of DatabaseType.REMOTE(The remote database).
        Returns:
        DoerDBSyncDataTable The Instance of DoerDBSyncDataTable associated with the DoerDatabase.

      • getSyncStatusTable

        public DoerDBSyncStatusTable getSyncStatusTable()
        Used to obtain Sync Status Table associated with the database. This would return null if the instance of DoerDatabase is a type of DatabaseType.LOCAL(The local database).
        Returns:
        DoerDBSyncStatusTable The Instance of DoerDBSyncStatusTable associated with the DoerDatabase.

      • getQueryExecutor

        public QueryExecutor getQueryExecutor()
        Used to obtain the query executor for this DoerDatabase.
        Returns:
        QueryExecutor The query executor for the DoerDatabase.
